1081460.name: PrincessGuardiansParodyH
1081460.description:
■ Play time
About 2 hours. I responded to the request and prepared PRG which feels a tug a little.

■ Game introduction sentence
Parody PRG using the character of the princess guardians.
The play factor which wasn't made in PRG which is an orthodox school is being taken in.
When having an interest in our work, please play princess 1 of guardians, too.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1015150/PrincessGuardians/

I'm strong and mount a new game.
To understand directionality of future's princess guardians, right or wrong 3-, please run 4 laps.


■ I make a list of the feature of this game.
* Degree of difficulty of an ordinary RPG
* Parody RPG
* The character of princess 1 of guardians is appearing.
* Multi-ending
* With the hiding character and hiding arms


■ Production tool
RPG TSUKURU MV

■ Development time
Planning: 7 days
Developing: 14 days
